name: incback
description: Node.js CLI tool & Lib for incremental backups using rsync with hard-linking

scripts.build:mac: npm run build && caxa --input . --output dist/mac/arm64/incback --exclude dist --exclude src --exclude test --exclude .git -- "{{caxa}}/node_modules/.bin/node" "{{caxa}}/build/cli.mjs"
scripts.build:linux:internal: npm run build && caxa --input . --output dist/linux/x64/incback --exclude dist --exclude src --exclude test --exclude .git -- "{{caxa}}/node_modules/.bin/node" "{{caxa}}/build/cli.mjs"
scripts.build:linux: docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t incback-linux -f docker-linux/Dockerfile . && docker run --platform linux/amd64 --rm -v "$(pwd)/dist:/app/dist" incback-linux
scripts.test:bin:linux: docker build -t incback-test-bin docker-bin && docker run --rm -v "$(pwd)/dist/linux/x64/incback:/app/incback" -v "$(pwd)/test:/data/source" -v "/tmp/backup:/data/dest" incback-test-bin /app/incback -s /data/source -d /data/dest
scripts.test: npm run test:cli-cjs && npm run test:lib-cjs && npm run test:cli-esm && npm run test:lib-esm && npm run test:ts
